thread.title: Kessel scores in OT to left Penguins past Predators

author: senh
title: Kessel scores in OT to left Penguins past Predators
text: BING NEWS: Kessel scores in OT to left Penguins past Predators NASHVILLE, Tenn. (AP) — Phil Kessel scored 41 seconds into overtime to give the Pittsburgh Penguins a 2-1 win over the Nashville Predators on Saturday night. Chris Kunitz had the other goal for Pittsburgh, which won for the fourth time in five games. 10/24/2015 - 3:55 pm | View Link Kessel has 2 goals in Penguins debut, Letang adds 4 points in win over Hurricanes Phil Kessel scored twice in his Pittsburgh debut and Kris Letang had a goal and three assists to lead the Penguins to a 7-3 win over the ... made 10 saves in the first 30 minutes.
